alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 11 at 3:08PM PST until February 13 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of one foot at Stevens Pass on US2. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph near higher peaks. * WHERE...Stevens Pass. * WHEN...From Sunday evening through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at Stevens Pass on US2. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning and evening commutes. Strong winds could cause damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
